name: Embedded Synchronization System
tagline: A prototypical IoT system that follows the Device-Gateway-Cloud model
body:
# Device
The mbed
![mbed](http://resolutedreamer.com/portfolio/graphics/EmbeddedSynchronization.jpg)
# Gateway
The Raspberry Pi
![Raspberry Pi](https://www.raspberrypi.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Pi2ModB1GB_-comp.jpeg)
# Cloud
mLab, MongoDB in the cloud.
![mLab Logo](https://tctechcrunch2011.files.wordpress.com/2016/02/mlab-logo.png)
